query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(serviced_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count, SUM(blocks_applied) AS total_blocks_applied, SUM(blocks_consumed) AS total_blocks_consumed, bait_applied WHERE serviced_date >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, bait_applied ORDER BY month, bait_applied

serviced_date.description: Date site was serviced and data recorded

blocks_applied.description: Number of new bait blocks added

bait_applied.description: Product name for rodent bait applied

table_metadata.title: Rodent control by citywide contractor
table_metadata.description: This database lists records of rodent treatments primarily in the City's combined sewer system. The data is collected and submitted by the current holder of the Citywide Integrated Pest Management contract.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Public health officials, city planners, environmental researchers

whom_it_may_interest: Public health officials, city planners, environmental researchers
title: Rodent control by citywide contractor
